channel.title: Twitter on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on PepsFeeder

item.title: Facebook, Twitter want Russian coronavirus disinformation details
item.description: State Department officials are claiming that disinformation related to the coronavirus — including some pushed by Russia — is rampant across popular social media platforms. But the government seems cagey about reporting the details to the companies involved.

item.title: Twitter told its employees to work from home because of the coronavirus
item.description: Twitter is encouraging its bigger than 4,800 workers across the field to brand a living from dwelling based on the unfold of the coronavirus. It’s even handed one of many most drastic steps taken by any tech company up to now based on the outbreak.

item.title: Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey could be ousted by activist investors
item.description: Jack Dorsey is the CEO of Twitter. He shall be the CEO of Sq.. That shouldn’t proceed to any extent further, says an funding community, who wishes Dorsey to quit running Twitter — or, not not up to, quit running every firms on the a similar time.
